title: Why am I getting placed in queue's for not accepting afk check
body: Didn't accept an afk check because the turd ass client said I disconnected and the buttons didn't work. Then I got placed in a 15 minutes queue. This isn't the first time it's happened.

replies.body:
This specific issue is typically a result of a poor or unstable connection to our matchmaking services. Our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will help you configure your local network settings for League and may resolve this issue entirely.

Let me know if this helped!

I'm not going to follow some guide that won't do anything when I know it's a spaghetti code client. I mean, cmon. The close button on it doesn't even work.

I'll just use the new client and hope for the best.
